price: 47. A korosey sinni Rabbih seeco oggola kaal taamineenimil, Yallih kabuk ayróy (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) num gacsam duude waa siinit tamaatek naharal. Woo ayró Yalli tet baaheek wadir eleelittan rike manton Yallih digaalák kaadu abten dambi tangaddeenim maduddan.
arabic: ٱسۡتَجِيبُواْ لِرَبِّكُم مِّن قَبۡلِ أَن يَأۡتِيَ يَوۡمٞ لَّا مَرَدَّ لَهُۥ مِنَ ٱللَّهِۚ مَا لَكُم مِّن مَّلۡجَإٖ يَوۡمَئِذٖ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن نَّكِيرٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: is'tajībū lirabbikum min qabli an yatiya yawmun lā maradda lahu mina al-lahi mā lakum min malja-in yawma-idhin wamā lakum min nakīrin
